subject: Archery
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The South Korean archer Im Dong-hyun broke his own world record as archery came to Lord’s, the home of cricket, for a test event for next year’s London Olympics.
snippet: The South Korean archer Im Dong-hyun broke his own world record as archery came to Lord’s, the home of cricket, for a test event for next year’s London Olympics.
